title: Implement data models in Rust
description: Implement models.rs with serde. Ensure JSON output matches Python exactly: same key order, same timestamp format, same pretty-printing.
creator: Ryan Alyn Porter

comments.author: Ryan Alyn Porter
comments.text: Goal: implement Rust data models and config loader with validation matching Python behavior.

comments.author: Ryan Alyn Porter
comments.text: Implemented Rust data models and configuration loader with validation, updated error type, added tests. make check-rust passed.
